name: skiddy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
performing or likely to cause a skid (= a sliding movement that cannot be controlled): I hit a skiddy patch on the road and then I just lost control of the car. The skiddy surface will mean the players will need to come in to the net more.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is the skiddier type of fast bowler who can succeed on these surfaces.In summer, the garden is fine, but for six months of the year it is a skiddy mud bath.
